posts.body: There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable.

posts.title: Ruby Posts
posts.body: Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old.

posts.title: Piton Posts
posts.body: The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested.
